Subjects: hymns, to saints; Francis of Assisi, saint
_description: A macaronic hymn to St. Francis, in a volume of songs by Ryman — eight 6-line stanzas, including a 2-line refrain, ‘As clerly nowe itte dothe appere / To feithfull man bothe farre & nere’

CULEe112.First Lines:
Salue decus pauperumIn whom be vertuys
                    ryue…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Thatt clerly then they may appereBefore thy face thatt is so
                    clere
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 318.
